Name: Pattern Recognition - PE
Text: We are given an event log and a set of normative constraints and desiderata. **Part 1: Normative Process Behavior (Strict Rules) - Key Constraints:** - Sequence: Application Received  Credit Check  Risk Assessment  Loan Decision  Inform Applicant  [If Approved: Finalize Documentation]  Close Case - Ordering Rules: 1. Credit Check must occur before Risk Assessment. 2. Risk Assessment must occur before Loan Decision. 3. Inform Applicant must occur after Loan Decision. 4. If loan is approved, Finalize Documentation must occur before Close Case. 5. If loan is rejected, do not finalize documentation before closing the case. What is Not Allowed: - Skipping activities in the required sequence. - Changing the order (e.g., doing Risk Assessment before Credit Check). - Performing Finalize Documentation after a rejection. - Closing the case without following the decision logic (Approved  Finalize Documentation before closing, Rejected  close without finalization). **Part 2: Desiderata (Recommended but Not Strict)** - Credit Check should be completed within 24 hours of Application Received. - Inform Applicant should be within 48 hours of Loan Decision. - Follow-up Call is encouraged but not required, and it should be before closing the case.
